description:
Help your young child learn counting, vocabulary and the alphabet with this fun, card-matching game.

Containing 3 different skill levels, choose the appropriate one for your child.  You can also choose to learn in the following categories: Numbers, Shapes & Colors, Alphabet, Animals, Fruits & Vegetables.

When a card is selected, the child will hear the word, along with a picture and the word presented.  When two cards are correctly matched, your little one will get a round of applause for his or her great work!

The app currently supports English, but more languages are on the way, including French, Chinese, and Spanish!

Please let us know if you have any suggestions on how to improve this app!
versionNote: v1.0.2: Increased touch responsiveness, fixed rotation issues, and other bug fixes.
